chart.title: Population by age group
chart.subtitle: Historic estimates from 1950 to 2023, and projected to 2100 based on the [UN medium scenario](#dod:un-projection-scenarios).

Population - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.descriptionShort: De facto total population in a country, area or region as of 1 July of the year indicated.
Population - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Population - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.citationLong: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Population, total – UN WPP” [dataset]. United Nations, “World Population Prospects” [original data].

Population - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.descriptionShort: De facto total population in a country, area or region as of 1 July of the year indicated.  Projections from 2024 onwards are based on the UN's medium scenario.
Population - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Population - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.citationLong: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Population, medium projection – UN WPP” [dataset]. United Nations, “World Population Prospects” [original data].

Population - Sex: all - Age: 65+ - Varia.descriptionShort: De facto total population in a country, area or region as of 1 July of the year indicated. This only includes individuals aged 65+.
